name: Thomas was not alone
description: This is a 2d game I made for indies' first game jam. I Had this concept in my head for a while now but didn't have time to do it, since I am working on combine.it. When I heard the theme of indies' first game jam I couldn't resist, I just had to make the game. I also made a devlog, check it out! Also please write some feedback. I love to hear feedback from you!
